summary: Life is never dull where Lord Brett Sinclair and Danny Wilde are concerned. But who would expect dire danger, hilarious though it may be, to face them in one of Brett's baronial homes? Even... See full summary »
cast: Roger Moore|Tony Curtis|Laurence Naismith|John Ronane|Andrew Keir|Tom Adams|Carmen Munroe|Clifton Jones|George Woodbridge|Tommy Godfrey|Arthur Brough|Robert Cawdron|Leon Greene|Michael Wynne|Talfryn Thomas|Hannah Gordon|Cy Grant|Rosemary Nicols|Michael Sheard
title: London Conspiracy
